attributes.action: discontinue the government petitions website as it is a plain attempt through use of the deadline mechanism to trivialise and disperse dissent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An obligatory deadline on a petition? Doesn't that appear to be barefaced "gatekeeping" on a democratic process. Just remember where these petition databases are stored and how easily (whoops...!) it is to delete such a database. Stick to paper petitions arriving at the No.10 front door.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
